titleStmt.title: Mother Shiptons prophesies: with three and XX. more, all most terrible and wonderfull, predicting strange alterations to befall this climate of England. Viz. 1. Of K. Richard the III ... 23. A prophesie of David, Cardinall of France, &c.
titleStmt.author: Shipton, Mother (Ursula)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. P. for Fr. Coles and are to besold [sic] at his shop at the signe of the Lambe in the Old-Baily, neare the Sessions house,

notesStmt.note: With a woodcut of Mother Shipton, Cardinal Wolsey, King Henry VIII and Mr. Saltmarsh on the title page.
Imperfect: cropped, torn, and tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Lambe in the Old-Baily, neare the Sessions house
